fields.name: children
fields.desc: The identifying keys and corresponding widget values in the segmented control.

fields.name: disabledChildren
fields.desc: The set of identifying keys that correspond to the segments that should be disabled.

fields.name: groupValue
fields.desc: The identifier of the widget that is currently selected.

fields.name: onValueChanged
fields.desc: The callback that is called when a new option is tapped.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The color used to paint the rounded rect behind the [children] and the separators.

fields.name: proportionalWidth
fields.desc: Determine whether segments have proportional widths based on their content.

fields.name: thumbColor
fields.desc: The color used to paint the interior of the thumb that appears behind the currently selected item.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space by which to inset the [children].
